data.content:
noun
plural -boards
[count] a board with ridges on its surface that was used in the past for washing clothes by rubbing wet clothes against it
Washboards are also sometimes used as musical instruments in some types of folk and country music.
The band featured a banjo and the rhythms of the washboard.
US informal :a group of strong and well-shaped muscles that can be seen on a person's stomach - usually used before another noun
a washboard stomach
washboard abs
